Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: கல்லாதான் சொற்கா முறுதல் முலையிரண்டும் இல்லாதாள் பெண்காமுற் றற்று.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The desire of the unlearned to speak (in an assembly), is like a woman without breasts desiring (the enjoyment of ) woman-hood.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: An unlearned man ('கல்லாதான்') stands eagerly trying to speak, his mouth open but no meaningful words coming out.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Juxtaposed next to him is a powerful and poignant visual metaphor: an abstract, stylized female form that lacks breasts ('முலையிரண்டும் இல்லாதாள்'), looking sorrowfully at a symbol of femininity or motherhood she cannot attain.
Layered_Composition.Background: A blurry, indistinct background, symbolizing the lack of substance and fulfillment in both scenarios.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A sharp, metaphorical comparison illustrating the unnatural and fruitless desire of an unlearned person to speak knowledgeably.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The core of the image is the direct visual comparison between the unlearned speaker and the breastless woman, both desiring a fulfillment for which they lack the essential quality.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A soft, somber, and melancholic lighting. The color palette is muted and desaturated to emphasize the sense of lack and unfulfillment.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A dual-portrait style shot, placing the two figures side-by-side to force the comparison.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a painterly, classical feel. The female form should be abstract and symbolic, not graphic.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Soft, diffused lighting, creating a mood of gentle sadness.

Cultural_Anchors: The unlearned desiring to speak ('கல்லாதான் சொற்காமுறுதல்')
